answers.author: Evelina Moulder
answers.text:
Results of ICMA's recent survey of local government health care programs identified those with onsite clinics. Hot Springs, AR, is one. The HR Specialist is Vickie Stauder, who can be reached at 501-321-6952. New Hanover County, NC, is another example. Andre Mallette is the ACM, who can be reached at 910-798-7184.
.

author: Steven Crowell
text: We are considering establishing an EMPLOYEE health clinic to eventually help reduce health premiums in a fully insured plan (i.e. Blue Cross and Blue Shield) not a self ensured plan.  I would be interested in any positive or negative expreiences anyone has in establishing an employee health clinic in a fully insured plan.
title: Emplopyee Heath Clinics
